abstract: The announcement sets up a potential confrontation between I.B.M. and Intel over the design of new, faster microprocessors.
snippet: The announcement sets up a potential confrontation between I.B.M. and Intel over the design of new, faster microprocessors.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Feb. 13  I.B.M. researchers say they have set a speed record for a type of computer memory that promises a fundamental performance increase in a coming generation of microprocessors with multiple computing engines.

headline.main: I.B.M. Reports a Speed Record for a Type of Computer Memory
headline.print_headline: I.B.M. Reports a Speed Record For a Type of Computer Memory
